mapper.update:
update IFT_PROFIT
CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME = #{customerTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=DATE}, CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REBATE = #{rebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RAISE_PRICE = #{raisePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE_TYPE = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where PROFIT_NO = #{profitNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update IFT_PROFIT set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REBATE = #{rebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RAISE_PRICE = #{raisePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PROFIT_NO = #{profitNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT * from IFT_PROFIT WHERE 1 = 1
AND PROFIT_NO = #{profitNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
